title: Listening tour
summary: Structured interviews across business, ops, and engineering to surface constraints, risks, and success criteria.

decisionGuidance.problemSolved: Modernization fails when only a small technical group defines the plan and misses operational and business realities.
whenToUse: Tribal knowledge is a known risk
Ops and security must support the end state
whenNotToUse: A decision has already been made and you only need execution planning

gotchas: Turns into unstructured conversations with no decisions
thingsToWatchOutFor.opinionatedGuidance: Time-box to 2–3 weeks and produce: top risks, top patterns, and a decision log.

complexity.rationale: Requires broad stakeholder access and synthesis discipline.
complexity.skillDemand: Facilitation and synthesis; ability to translate concerns into architecture decisions.
complexity.operationalDemand: Moderate—must capture operational constraints and turn them into guardrails.
complexity.toolingDemand: Basic documentation tooling; shared repository for decisions.
